(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5D to forge (D1)

This weapon is loaded with bolts from the Realm of Dead. The bolts will explode in a shower of Death magic when they strike. Those affected by it will wither and die within minutes. Anyone who carries this weapon will be cursed.
